The best advise that I can give you, is never get out of your vehicle and go in.  Drive-Drive away and go to a different location or another company that cares, because this Las Vegas lotion is horrible, the worst in sales, needed supplies stock, maintenance, management, and most important - customer satisfaction.  Please don't follow my mistakes.

This dealership is horrible... There service department takes forever to take care of your rv... They don't return calls.  Not to mention I was told by a tech not to leave  any valuables in my rv because of theft there... I dropped my rv off in beginning of August and still have not gotten it back and it is the end of September.

I've read the reviews and I have to disagree. I had my RV serviced at the Las Vegas store. They are slammed with work and a mistake or something might slip by. I brought it  to my service supervisor MIKE's attention and he went out of his way to get things right. It takes time but squeezing someone in to correct an issue I would expect no less. 
I have spent some time there and watching and listening to the 2 service supervisors work, I think those guys do the best I've seen in awhile. Never upset. Always showing concern. Even when I rib em they still smile. 
Thank you Mike for everything you have done. I hope your there for a long time to come.

I am sorry that we purchased our RV through Camping World. We love the RV, but the service department is horrible! They either gouge you or ignore you! 
Recently our satellite would not retract and we were charged $125 dollars for them to tell us that we just needed to hold the button in longer! 
My husband took the unit down to have service done on the generator. Despite the fact that we had an appointment made for this weeks ago he was told they might not be able to get to it that day! He told them he didn't need it that day and could pick it up the next day. They told him they would call when it was finished. That was Monday. He called yesterday (Black Friday) and no one answered. He called today and was told that it had not been serviced yet! No excuse for this! 
If I could give negative stars to Campingworld's service department I would!

Update 2: We brought our class A in to get a tow package for the Smart Car. Everything went smoothly until the Roadmaster celanoid failed. Twice. Luckily the techs discovered it before we left the parking lot. John-John, Oscar and Denny refused to give up. Finally a good celanoid was delivered and everything works great. These guys went above and beyond for us. They spent hours showing us how to connect and disconnect the system. They went on a drive with us to show us how it works. These are awesome people! No complaints at all with the service department! Kudos to Mike for having a great team. 

Update: Since purchasing our new motor coach, we experienced several factory deficiencies in some areas. We were told by other owners, it doesn't matter if you spend $80g or $500 g, there will be kinks to work out. We had the toilet or some part of it break, three times, the dinette conversion bed was not properly constructed making sleeping on it dangerous and the whole entry door was crooked. All of these issues have been handled each time efficiently and professionally by the Camping World service department. While they don't like seeing us so often, we have come to know several employees by name and have a good relationship with them. The service manager Mike is awesome and makes every effort to get things done in a timely fashion. John Miller, PDI, knows so much as he used to work at the Thor factory and John, one of the technicians is extremely knowledgeable. We don't enjoy having to keep taking the thing back but it's so nice to be greeted warmly by our salesman, TJ and the other staff. My husband believes people in the service industry should be tipped whenever allowed and these folks are no different. A few bucks and a sincere thank you go a long way. We are looking forward to many road trips and adventures in our rv.

Not the most ethical sales people (Steve T) Will ruin your buying RV experience.  When you go in there to make a deal with them - the first words that came out of his mouth was "Be prepared to take a BIG loss." Seriously!? who starts off a negotiation like that.  He tried telling me the trade in value for  my 2016 travel trailer would "depend" on what I was buying.    That was the first flag.   Your trade in value should be your trade in value weather you buy something new or old.  Thats a classic sleezy salesman tactic of working it into their profits.     He told me originally the trailer I wanted was in the "High30s."   When I told him I had a trade in, He changed the price to 49k for the trailer.     When I told him that was way too high of a price and I know what that trailer should go for - he lowered it to 35k within seconds!    So Ridicules.   The guy was totally arrogant and made my skin crawl.  Terrible experience.

These guys are a bunch of clowns. Brought our 5th wheel here and wanted to get the awning fixed. 2 weeks later we still hadn't received a call to tell us how much it was going to be to fix it. I finally called them and they told me they were just getting to it. Long story short I went down and took my 5th wheel someplace else, because when you are standing there in front of them and they take over 1.5 hours of your time to do a write up they really don't give a crap about you.
Worst bank ever! Check out my review on Fuddrucker's for that story and it isnt the first time. No customer advocacy whatsoever! They will screw you and be smug about it the entire time.

This is my 4th year coming to David at iQTAXX. The first year my papers were a hot mess. David took the time to sort through all of my receipts and also explain every detail of what he was doing. He's got more experience in the field than anyone at the major name places who are just taught to punch in numbers. David really knows the field and that's what you want with the guy handling your money. He gets me the max refund every year!!!! No one else I would go to our even consider.

We just received the tax professionalism , efficiency, & help we were looking all over the valley for. Spartak was excellent and made a painful task amazing. I highly recommend him for all your tax needs, he will not disappoint.

Lizzie is one of the worst professional person you can ever deal with.  First of all she never honors her appointment time with me.  For the tax filing she expects her clients to do her work which makes no sense since she is charging 300 per clients.  She was absolutely rude to me.  She seemed like she misses her filing to IRS.  She will try to rush you during your filing which is very annoying because you have no idea what is going on.   For that price i pay, at least she can treat the customer nicely.  It seems like  that all the people who gave her 5 star are paid people but who knows.   Save yourself from her and dont go to this place.  She takes more client than she can handle, which reflects on how she treats people.

Found these guys on Yelp- Yelp is such a great tool for these kinds of services. Lizeth was amazing and gave us a lot of great advice for the future. She made taxes as painless as possible and the whole staff there are very nice, especially in the stressful time-2 days before tax day!! I am also grateful they were open on a sunday, it was really convenient for us.
I used to go here because Lizeth was always great. Unfortunately, she is no longer with iQTAXX, so I am not sure if I will continue to go there.
This is the 2nd Year I get my Taxes done here. Very knowledgable, honest and great service..

Great service. Spartak has done our taxes the past two years and we have had many changes that had to be made. We still came out on top. The owner David really takes time to care about his customers and values feedback. So glad we found IQTAXX and we tell all of our friends!

I am VERY happy with the quality of service here. Lizeth has done my taxes for two years now and I am really grateful to her for knowledge and expertise. She made me smile and laugh all the while finding me deductions I never knew about. Never thought it was possible to smile while filing taxes :). Will definitely continue to file here!

I read the reviews here and decided to give them a try. Spartak did mine. Friendly, knowledgeable, and reasonable team. Another place told me I owed $700..With him I owed IRS less than $200. I paid $169 for mine and referred a family member and she paid $49 after $50 discount. If you go there mention Blendi for a $50 discount on yours also.

This place is amazing!!! I made an appointment for 11:00 AM, the wait time was not long at all! the service was professional fast, quick, and easy! and better yet i found this place on YELP!   Spartak was the gentleman who helped me, and got me everything and anything i wanted back on my taxes!!  They gave me the 50$ coupons if i referrer people next year my taxes will be free!!!!  I only paid 99$ that's nothing!!!!  yes you can do it cheaper online or at Walmart but are you getting your full amount back????? give it a try!

I highly recommend IQtaxx. This was my first year doing my taxes with them and David is great but I was really impress with his staff specially Lizeth who is very professional, knowledgeable and truly enjoys her job. I plan to do all my taxes with them every year. Best place in town!!

What an efficient tax service!  David was really wonderful. Took care of all my 1099's and w2's in about 30 minutes.  I will be a lifetime customer,  he made a harrowing process very painless! Thanks so much.

I was highly disappointed with our appointment.

We sat down and I provided my paperwork which was a lot. We had donation receipts, other income, W2s, student loans, etc. I also had a list of bank statements that were itemized for other write offs. We spent a lot of money last year and also bought a home so I was anticipating to itemize some deductions. 

The employee put in our documents in about 10-15 min. I think she asked me 5 times if I had any cash donations, which I did not. She never asked me about any other deductions. She then said we owed around $5000.00 for taxes. I have never paid this much in my life and considering we had bought a home I was not expecting this. 

I advised this was not acceptable and she had her manager come over and review what she had put in her system. The manager found one other small tax deduction for the home in the amount of about $200 and said everything was good to submit. I advised I would need to go through my documents and figure out if we had any other deductions because the amount was completely unreasonable. So, we left. 

I went home and that night, I went through Turbo Tax and sure enough found a TON of other deductions that were never even asked. These were deductions which were substantiated with receipts. So, I decided I would give The employee a chance to fix the return and called the next day. I was told The employee was with a client and that she would call me back. Did I ever get a call back. NO. I did not. 

I ended up taking all my information and deductions I found to Jackson Hewitt  and They helped me file my return. It took around 4 hours, YES.. .we have a lot tax items. I would never expect it to take 15 minutes. She got the money we owed down to $900.

Spartak prepared our taxes this year. We were very satisfied with his service. He seemed very knowledgeable about everything. He was very patient and funny. We highly recommend him to anyone who is looking for a good tax man. For a $50 discount  on your tax preparation tell them Laszlo referred you. They are open late which is very convenient Good luck!

Getting my taxes done at iqTAXX was a fantastic and painless experience.

As someone who is new to owning a small business, there was no small amount of confusion about the additional paperwork required for tax purposes. 

Lizeth not only answered all my questions, but suggested a few things that will probably lead to saving me a lot of money down the road.

Quite happy with my taxes this year, and will certainly be back in twelve months.

Just did our small business taxes here again for the second year in a row, and David the owner did our taxes for us since our previous tax consultant recently left. David's extremely friendly and knowledgeable and willing to teach, which is awesome since we still have a lot to learn about owning a small business. He helped us with categorizing all of our expenses, depreciating our equipment purchases, and invited us back again for a consultation to discuss how we can improve our business going forward. We'll be coming back next year as well!

I had a horrible experience last year doing our taxes here. I went by the reviews of this place but the rep that we had didn't have a clue as to what she was doing. We didn't get a high return like we usually do and the rep even forgot to add in the school costs when we told her about it twice. You can take your chances but I won't be returning.

Lizeth is the BEST!  Her down to earth and personable attitude makes me feel comfortable and welcomed ever year I see her.  She is extremely helpful and knowledgable when it comes to maximizing your refund.  You will receive top quality professional service at IQ Taxx.  Highly recommended...ask for Liz!
I have absolutely no complaints.   David was great... very helpful & knew what he was doing.  Would highly recommend!

Once again, 2 big thumbs up for great service and super friendly staff. I made an appointment with Lizeth and she remembered me from the last time I was there. She was extremely helpful and she was a delight to talk to. I recommend them for all tax issues.

I just moved to Las Vegas from California and put off filing my taxes. I looked all over town for the most reputable tax preparer. I searched online and asked around. The community pointed me in the right direction. I read some reviews about their tax services and made an appointment tosee David. He showed me respect and attention. He didn't make me feel dumb for not filing my taxes and even offered to help to abate my late fees and interest owed. He helped me along the way and even gave me some sound advice. Iam glad I found this tax service. No one better!

Did our taxes today with Lizeth and she was AMAZING!!! She was very helpful and showed genuine interest in helping us out. Its our first time meeting her as we saw David last year but she made us feel like we've known each other for a long time!  2nd year with Iqtaxx and will continue to recommend them to our friends and family. Cant wait to do our taxes with her next year!!

Unprofessional . Had a phone appointment way in advance . I waited 2 hours and counting . Keep saying we ll call you back they never did. I don't not have time all day to wait for your phone call . I am never going back to them period .  I had such a pleasant and professional experience the first time . I am very shocked and disappointed.

As a new business owner I was a couple years behind on filing my business taxes.  Lizeth at iQ Taxx was very courteous to me with all my questions, and there were plenty.  Also keeping me informed on the whole process from beginning to end.  I am very happy to do business with iQ Taxx as they have helped me with mine.  Support Small Business :)

I've used IQTAXX for the past 4 years and plan to return this year. I worked with David and had a lot of complicated situations. David was honest and straightforward in maximizing my return without exaggerating anything that might raise my chances of an audit. Very friendly and flexible.
Very friendly and welcoming staff. 3 different tier pricing. Small, knowledgable and credible. And! If you refer three people to them, you get next year's taxes done.. For free!!

This place is great!! Lizeth was awesome. Had an issue with stock sales in 2011. She looked everything over for free. Nothing she could do as far as taxes but she gave me all the info I need to solve my problem. Very efficient and prompt. Thanx Lizeth!!! I highly recommend this business.

We are new to Nevada and when our tax finances over whelmed us; we did not know where to turn. 
I saw IQTAXX  high Yelp ratings, they were right on ! The whole staff was great, but Lizath was so knowledgeable, helpful , explained everything articulately. We live in Pahrump and will happily drive the 60 miles to have Liz as our financial adviser!

Discovered iQTAXX Tax Services on Yelp, chose them based on their reviews and enlisted their service for my 2015 Tax return. While I don't have the most complicated tax situation, I had a few big life events (marriage, new mortgage on a rental property) and wanted to make
sure I was maximizing my tax return and not missing out on any tax benefits. 

George was extremely responsive to my e-mails and questions and I felt the fee for his services was very fair. George is truly a great professional and it was a pleasure to work with him. He's got an efficient process and ensures that you are 100% satisfied before filing. This is my first year working with George and I plan on continuing working with him in the future. They also had an in-house loan officer who answered my questions thoroughly and helped me plan for acquiring new properties. 

Highly recommend.

My very first time to write a review in yelp! I'm truly amaze & very happy on how SPARTAK DAVIDAGAYAN did my tax return! it only take a 30 minutes to done his job! He is very Nice person and He also did my mother tax return & I also bring my sister to do her tax return! I "Highly Recommend SPARTAK DAVIDAGAYAN " I'm definitely coming back!

We specifically chose this place to file our taxes as a married couple because they said repeatedly over the phone I won't have to mail my original ID (I need it for travel). We verified it with them several times and they acknowledged REPEATEDLY that they would be able to certify a copy so that I didn't have to mail the original. Yet, when we came by for our appointment they told us I would have to send the original and they can't certify a copy. So basically they're saying they're gonna charge $150 to mail an envelope. Thank you, we can do that ourselves. What exactly are they getting paid for? And why say they can certify a copy of my ID over the phone several times when they can't actually do that? Thanks for wasting our time.

Lizeth at IQ TAXX is absolutely amazing! She makes it so easy to correspond with her via email during my busy work week. My appointment was so quick and painless as well. I love that she not only prepares my taxes for me, but also walks me through everything to make sure I finally understand what she is doing. In just one session with her, I feel like I learned more about taxes than I have ever known. So helpful! The rest of the staff at the office is so friendly and helpful too! 

I recommend IQ Taxx to everyone I know and will continue to be a loyal customer!
We've been going to IQ Taxx since 2013 and Lizeth is always superb and exceptional with her service! We appreciate that she takes her time in taking care of us!

Really, this is a prefect example of when a 4.5 rating is a perfect fit for a business.

For the first time since turning 18, I had to have someone else do my taxes. This year brought on several things I was unfamiliar with, as far as how to file correctly.

Pros-

- These people are so friendly. Not your stereotypical cold, stuffy suits at all! Everyone from reception to the tax preparers were very genial and approachable. Spartak was the representative who assisted me and he was great!

- If there are any questions or concerns at all, they have a whole team of professionals with varying strengths that all work together to get the right information. I had questions regarding gift taxes and when Spartak wanted to make sure his information was corrected, all he had to do was IM someone on his desktop and someone was at the desk in a jiffy! Great communication between everyone in their office!

- They made a scan of all related forms/paperwork to my return and they keep it on file in the event that you should have any questions. They also neatly package your copies in a snazzy little folder for your own personal records.

Cons-

- I had to wait for about a full hour after my appointed time....and I got there 15 minutes early. Ugh. After waiting 45-50 minutes, Spartak did come out, apologize for the wait, and said he'd be ready in 2 minutes...but then it was another 15-20 minutes till I saw him again! lol 

- If you want to have your preparation fee taken out of your refund, it is a $40 fee. I opted to just pay outright for my fee that day.

From the information I gathered, they charge anywhere from $29-$169 for their services. With all the things involved in my return I was in the $169 club, but I still feel it was well worth it. 

I'm guessing the $29 fee is for a simple 1040EZ form. I'm shocked anybody would feel the need to pay to have someone fill out that simple 1 page form for them. I think I could tape a pen to my chihuahua's paw and he could manage to complete a 1040 EZ...but I digress..

I referred a friend to them and he went in several days later. His return was a lot less "involved" than mine, so he only paid $119. So apparently there is some sort of pricing "scale"....

Overall, this is a great service run by friendly and highly competent reps. I definitely give it a big ole' thumbs up!

4.5 stars!
dissatisfied with the service! unfortunately it is a hassle to get a hold of David and ask some questions about your taxes. Plus, I don't think he has fair enough knowledge about taxes.

Lizette is the best. She always seems to fit me in and accommodate my schedule when I come close to missing deadlines. She gives me great advice on business ideas as well as preparing to buy a house. I feel like I can talk to her about anything and everything she is a very personable person and I have recommended a lot of friends to her. If you need help with taxes or getting on tack to buy a house call Iqtaxx and ask for lizette ;)

Extremely sad to learn that the great tax pros are all gone. Brenda helped me so much and she's now gone. 

I recommended this place because of the tax pro that I worked with but she's no longer there. I called to speak with her but sadly the staff was not very friendly in communicating she was no longer with the company. 

I have to give them less stars for their lack of professionalism.

For being 21, I've never actually done my own taxes. Usually I have my mother do them, but trying to be an adult, I figured I'd do my own this year. I tagged along with my cousin to her appointment, after hearing her and her boyfriend continuously compliment their tax lady. And after going here, I can definitely see why. Not only does Liz do her best with getting you the most refund back possible, she is also very personable and I enjoyed her enthusiam. After this, I will be sure to make my own appointments with her in the future and recommend her to all of my friends. (Make sure you do too because you wont have to pay if you recommend 3 people)

The only reason I knocked a star off was because instead of offering to route my banking information, I am now waiting on a check... I forgot to ask, but I feel like it is a common form of payment and she shouldve mentioned it or something.
Awesome people, upbeat environment, accuracy guaranteed!  Highly recommended!!!

Update-
At 7:13pm...I get a phone call from them trying to "bribe" me to come back.  I'm not that hard up for money that I would go back to get more crappy service. honestly I was frustrated.  Wouldn't u be? Then she proceeded to get me more frustrated by telling me that I never confirmed.  Well maybe they need to get their phones checked cuz apparently they can make calls but they can't receive calls. Cuz I called yesterday 3 times from a land line and 5 times today from a cell and all 8 times they picked up and they couldn't hear me. This happened to another customer while I was waiting because u can hear the receptionist "hello? Iqtaxx. Hello??? Iqtaxx" click.  So how is a customer supposed to confirm when their phones don't work???? And her parting line to me....now imagine this in the ¿itchiest tone possible...."well we were going to do your taxes for free". That just proved to me that I made the right decision to leave that place. At this point I don't care about the money.  I just want good customer service.  I don't want the other person on the other line getting ¿itchy with me just cuz I'm frustrated from their lack of service. Never ever going back. What a waste of time.  


So I arrived for my 6pm appoinment at 5:57pm....only to see that there were 4 ppl in line ahead of me for a 6pm appoinment as well....hhhmmmm....not a good start. One of my pet peeves....what the point of making an appoinment if u show up on time only to have to waste time waiting.  Gggrrrr

So at 6:35pm... there is a walk in...and she goes in right away!  I'm like WTH! I guess her taxes were simpler then mine by what she said but still she's goes in with no waiting....not cool when other ppl including me have been waiting.  So far my experience kind of sucks. 

At 6:52pm I ask when am I going to be seen next as i have been waiting almost an hour at this point.  The girl at the receptionist desk tells me that the since my appoinment was not confirmed that they took me off the schedule.  I mean seriously she couldn't have told me this at the beginning when I checked in????? Then she tells me that the walk in at 6:35pm took the guy that was supposed to see me. Seriously?????? So even though I had an appoinment that they didn't confirm.....the walk in has precedence over me.  How is that right??????

So at 7:02pm. I left.  So yes this review is only in their crappy service.  I can't tell u how they did on my taxes as I hate having ppl waste my time.  What makes them think that their time is more important then mine?????? And seriously do they think that they are the only tax ppl around?
It was a pleasure working with Vlad! He helped our family with quite a few tax questions in no time and we'll definitely use his services again in the future!

Very competent and knowledgeable accountant! My family has been using his service for over 2 years now and we are very pleased with the quality of the work and tax services provided. Highly recommended for personal and business tax services.

Drove into this somewhat overwhelming place that does everything for your camper.  I have been to another one before and had such a great experience decided to cover all the things needed here.  Went in to ask about getting the things done that we needed done and was told go there and there and there.  Sounds fair.  The first there was in a different place than pointed too.  Then I was told the gas was outside and we will "get there when we can".  I get busy, I have seen busy in many places.  But rude is not necessary.  We asked how to go to the service section.  Do we need to register somewhere?  Do we pull up and someone will come out?  Do we sign in the building over there?  "just drive over there.  Not my department".  So we left.  Good thing nothing needs to be done today.  It can wait until we get back to the Camping world in Santa Clarita CA where we get treated well.

Worst place ever. The sales department does not even know what customer service is. The service department is horrible.  After buying a new 5th wheel here. The roof delaminated on the second trip. We made an appointment to bring it in. My husband talked to them 4 times before we brought it in. Then we took it in and they said we did not have an appointment . We have talked to keystone direct on the issue and tried to give them the contact who is aware of the roof defect. Nope camping world could care less who we talked to.  The only reason we used them now is they are the authorized keystone dealer. Stay away from this place if you can. Aug 31,2016

I purchased a high end Class A used diesel pusher from this Camping World in April 2011. I was upgrading from a Class C gas motorhome to this big diesel pusher. I knew very little about these larger motorhomes and kept asking lots of questions of the salesman, sales mgr, service mgr, "diesel specialist" salesman & location GM. 

My biggest question had to do with what sort of fuel mileage I could expect. They ALL told me that I could expect to get 10-12+mpg. Well, after driving it for 2 years, at 55 mph MAX,  in all kinds of terrain, the motorhome averages 6 mph. Downhill, totally empty with the wind it might get 7mpg MAX. If they were just estimating the mpg for me, I might chalk up their bad advice to their IGNORANCE. However, unbeknownst to me when I bought the RV, it has a computer which tracks mpg of trips and for the life of the RV. It has averaged 6mpg before I bought it and after I bought it! So when I was asking all these RV specialists, not one of them showed me the computer and previous mileage history. They ALL continued to give me TOTALLY WRONG info. 

Either they are ALL totally ignorant- not knowing about the computer, which is std on big diesels, or they LIED to me. I know which one I think they are.

Needless to say I will NEVER buy anything from them again and I highly recommend you DO NOT do business with this group of liars.

I give the 1 star only because the system won't allow 0 stars.

HORRIBLE Service!  Took 2.5 weeks just to get an appt.  They kept it for 2 weeks, and we finally had to call them to see where the repairs were at.  They charged INSANE amounts for diagnosis of problems.  For EACH small part that needed a 5 minute repair, they charged a full hour of labour, and were totally inflexible!!  We had 4 small things that needed repair.  Their part prices are totally unreasonable.  AND they even forgot to repair the main problem we came in for!  The service guy was a meek personality-less policy-quoting parrot. I will never take our RV to any camping world again! They have no care for customer retention nor customer satisfaction.

Tried to buy a new $300K motor home here today, but walked away disgusted with their misleading sales tactics and total failure to negotiate in good faith. This is the second time we've been here and we should have learned from the first time. This dealership holds out for maximum profits and is deceptive. Watch out!

The reason for my last review is that repairs take weeks to complete.  On my last visit which the coach was in the shop for 6 weeks I spend nearly 10,000 and  I 
asked to have air pressure checked while it was still in the bay. The service writer said sure it's about $ 26.00    I was speechless!!!!!

This is the worst service department I have ever encountered.  I have been dealing with them for a year because I bought my motor home from them.  They have had it on the lot more than I have had it on the road filling me with every excuse in the book.  Mike is a nice kid but over his head.  DO NOT trust them to do anything they say within their time frame.  C all them every day.  My issues were warranty related and they didn't even send the requests in until I complained to the service manager several months after I left it.  Terrible, terrible, terrible.  My sales experience was great but I will never deal with them again because of the service.

Upset with them.  Bought a 2016 Freedom Elite in August. Took it on its maiden voyage as instructed and found some items which needed fixed.  Took the list to them and was told they can only fix 10 items at a time!!!!  This was a brand new RV!  After much discussion they said they would fix them.  This was the end of August as of today January 17th...we do not have our RV back yet!   We call and call to talk with service... Sometimes they call us back, sometimes they don't.   For new RV owners we are very disappointed!!!!   If we were asked would you buy an RV from Camping at this point in time, I am afraid it would not be a very positive response.

I have had very good customer service in the parts department at this Camping World. Phil in the store has been very helpful in getting generic parts for my trailer and Tresia in the OEM Parts department has been a good liaison with Forest River on specific parts for my r-pod. I would use them again and recommend them for parts.

I went to these guys to get my 2011 taxes done. They gave me an estimate cost of 300-350$ total. But when the bill came, it was for 400$. When I complained about the discrepancy, they said it was because they had to do extra work because I own shares of stock. Dah?
 When I complained that I did not think this was fair, & I would not come back in the future, they said they did not care.
They are really expensive and do not describe or itemize what they are billing for.  You get a lump sizeable fee without knowing what it is for.

Tax n Docs tax service is a 4 Diamond establishment for tax services!  Eliam is extremely knowledgeable for all things tax related both foreign and domestic which for my wife and I was perfect. Folks please don't hesitate to call his office with any and all of your tax questions they will have an answer or get back to you with an answer very quickly.

A+++ Had my taxes done and of course I wait til the last day.  Eliam Bernal came in his day off and took care of my messy tax situation.  He eased my nerves immediately with his welcoming personality and his wealth knowledge of being a tax advisor. Will be returning next year!
We had our taxes done. The cost for preparation was very reasonable. Eliam was friendly and knowledgeable. We will definitely go back to him next year.

I have been with Clearview Federal Credit Union for over 20 years because it used to be my company credit union and I've had many loans through it,my credit is great and I have been able to borrow lots of money and pay it back.  unfortunately due to the quote ( meant to be redundant) "we have to be competitive " & "everyone else is doing it" fees they are charging I am currently looking for a different credit union.  And will transfer my current car loan as well, now that I have already transfered  my Visa and signature loans!  make sure before you join to look at all their fees there is a fee for everything even if your own savings account is your overdraft protection. there are transfer fees from your own accounts if you just want to transfer money, Do your homework. and find a better credit union, the raaising of fees has become an annual trend and is sure to continue to rise..  the general malaise of the  customer service agents is very disappointing. I'm sure it's due to all of the complaining that they must be getting as fees go up every year. it's great to belong to a credit union for such a long time and sad to have to leave it because it has lost that feeling of family. And of customer service skills.  be sure to read the reviews that are not recommended, for some reason they have not been factored into the star rating of this bank which truly does not represent this business thoroughly.

My experience with Clearview has gotten even better with the mobile app - now featuring mobile deposits!!! I no longer have to worry about getting my checks to the bank; I can deposit them from anywhere, anytime. Best thing to happen in my personal-banking life! I sincerely recommend this credit union for anybody in western PA seeking honest, professional and efficient banking (see my previous review for more reasons).

Oak bank rocks! I like that they are locally owned. The offer a high level of customer service. Their rates (loans and deposits) are competitive. Again, their customer service is top notch. Everyone is extremely helpful and friendly. You get the impression they really appreciate your business. 

I am currently in the process of refinancing my house. The process has been painless, efficient, and I am extremely pleased with the interest rate. 

Added bonus - fresh baked cookies in the lobby every day!

Oak Bank far exceeded my expectations. Do not go here if you are expecting a typical banking experience. With a spacious interior, personable staff, and unconventional design (their tellers have no cash on hand, for example), Oak Bank is for the client who wants to take their banking seriously.
I went to Oak Bank having heard positive recommendations, and thus far, I've been impressed by their general banking services, as well as mortgage services. Even their mobile banking competes with large competitors, which can be a concern with smaller banks. So are you ready to lay down roots in the Madison area? Do you want to trust your bank, even in this age of certainty? Oak Bank is personable and professional. By Fitchburg, in Fitchburg. We're all in this together, my fellow citizens. This place is worth checking out.

I have been a customer of Nancy Kim State Farm for many years. Once I realized I wasn't happy with my old insurance company I called Nancy right away remembering she had an insurance agency. After the call, I rushed right down and signed on with them immediately. I didn't sign up for the mere purpose that I knew her, I signed up because the prices for everything I needed were less than I was paying with Allstate and the service was nothing but the best. From that point, my entire family switched from their providers, along with people in my office. I would recommend Nancy Kim State Farm to anyone! Keep up the amazing work.

Called them and had everything done over the phone. Quick easy fast and simple. Service was excellent, very personable. I love the vibe they gave off. Told me exactly what was included and did not try to up sell which was a great thing.

The services here at State Farm are phenomenal. The staff are all very friendly and getting set up with car and life insurance was super fast and easy. I highly recommend this company to anyone needing car or life insurance. They also offer a "good student" discount which is very beneficial for college students like me. In addition, my family and I saved money switching to State Farm from another insurance company!

If they could get zero stars I would give them the zero stars. I have used this company off and on for the past five years in Vegas and have never had any problems. However now that there is a problem it is a huge problem that they cannot seem to fix. On July 16 I went into their office to cancel my policy, I was told I would have a refund within 2 weeks and that it usually doesn't even take that long. I have been calling since August 1st trying to find out where my refund is and unfortunately they never canceled my policy. Which means no refund has been issued and I am still paying for insurance on a car that I do not own any longer. I have been calling them and Nevada direct to try to get my policy canceled since August 1 and no one has called me back. Yesterday both offices phones were disconnected for the entire day. I called Nevada direct and had Nevada direct contact them and they said they would call me back, that never happened. Now here it is a month later and I still have insurance and no refund on its way. No one will return my phone calls and when I do speak to them they tell me they will handle it and call me back. This is a complete joke and I'm going to the better business bureau.

Usually the service is great and fast, just took off one star because seems like theyre taking their time today. Im falling asleep but this is still my favorite insurance for my car. Usually they have 3 people but I see only 2 today and im so tired.
Still very  happy with the level of professionalism and service I receive from Jeff at  this State farm. I really feel like I'm in great hands and I would refer anyone to them without hesitation.

typical scummy insurance agents!!!!!!! lied about policy and only want to sell the product just so they can get commission. wanted to cancel policy and was told i would pay penalty. duhhhhh...you pay premium and you get insurance policy. you don't pay premium and they cut it off right away!!! i never heard of, if you don't finish out the term of the policy, you have to pay a penalty and fees!!! do not use nancy kim and jeff!!! horrible individuals selling insurance!!! commission whores!!! do not trust what they say!!!

Spoke to Nancy on the phone and she insisted I come in to meet her, even though I preferred to just set everything up over the phone (typical high-pressure salesman tactic - this should have been warning #1). But OK, fine - I set up an appointment. I get to her office at the appointment time and she's not even there!

So let me get this right:  You insist on me coming in to meet you and then don't even show up? This is the most disrespectful thing you can ever do to a customer. I have been a long time State Farm customer, but the agents in Las Vegas so far are really letting me down.

This review is for the Corporate Office. I purchase RV INSURANCE 2 years ago. Recently, it came up for renewal and I noticed a $60 increase for the 16ft travel trailer single axel. I flipped the back page of the policy and noted I was dinged as having an " At fault accident" last year. This accident was NOT AT FAULT as determined by my CAR INSURANCE PROVIDER,as well as,the police officer at the scene. I called my progressive agency and was immediately treated "at fault." I was just about ready to go to the CALIFORNIA DMV & police department thinking one of them must have logged in this no fault accident to my credit. I called the reporting agency LEXIS NEXIS who Progressive states is their reporting company to ask for a print out. A few day later I get a credit report....... Ah? I didn't want this but, "Thank you, I think" I call LexisNexis again for the driving report and. LOW & BEHOLD ..... No at fault car accident to my credit.   A few day later, I received my bill for the 2nd premium with Progressive on the RV, after I had already cancelled the policy in writing & verbally, with my agent. 
Today I called Progressives 800 number to notify them again I have cancelled the policy and have s new provider ( paid in full) for my RV INSURANCE which is the same provider of my car insurance. Of course, " Rashid" asked me WHY I am cancelling and I basically, go in to all of the above explanation... I'm "not AT FAULT" says the POLICE REPORT, my car insurance and most likely the DMV. "Rashid" proceeded to explain to me that: Progressive labels you IN THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA AT FAULT, if the accident yields more than $1000. First of all, Progressive was never my car insurance, they never paid out, my car insurance gave me back my deductible after investigation and even progressives Reporting agency doesn't have that info... So who decided I was "AT FAULT?" Progressive- then they increased my RV RATE. So I dumped them and saved $60/year! "Rashid" was also condescending say," well I'm not going to explain it to you again . You are not listening. I replied," yea, I know the feeling" he had the nerve to boast, " we are a Fortune 500 company" we won't be if we conducted ourselves differently. WOW! Next, letter to the California Insurance Commissioner.

On January 23, 2010, around 5:15 PM, my 2002 Honda CRV battery failed at the Foothills Visitor Center Park Headquarters in Sequoia National Park, a mile from the park entrance.  My college classmate & I were about to leave the park. We traveled from Los Angeles and not familiar with the area.

I was very pleased with Progressive Roadside Assistance especially in this time of need. Your customer service representative, Mary Lou was very polite, helpful and concerned.

I watch alto of the commercials for Progressive insurance.
The ones that are"offensive" to me. Are the ones where "Flo" 
Talks down to "Jamie"who helps get outta lot.
Also the most "offensive" to date is the one that you
Have the fake "TMZ" people follow Flo than at the
End of the commercial make fun of her.
To me this is very rude and distasteful. 
I have mentioned this ad of yours to friends 
And family they agree that intends to be taken
Off. We know you can do better and have better 
Taste for your ads.

Even though I could have went to H&R block to file my taxes this year as usual but I wanted to have some change. I found Patrick solely through Yelp and I think I made the right decision.

Even though, I thought Brampton might be too far for him but he managed to come here on time and the way he handled everything, I was quite impressed. I am surely going to recommend Patrick to all of my friends.
Amazing service! Patrick was incredibly polite, professional, and extremely helpful. Can't express enough how well served we are.

Amazing! 6 years of backdated taxes, sorted in 3 hours everything and got myself a nice tax refund too!

Extremely happy, professional, quick and knowledgeable. Just what I needed! A+++!

My wife and I usually do our taxes at H&R block, but not anymore! 
The representatives for this company are both more personable and thorough with their work than H&R ever was. Also, the cost in comparison was a lot more reasonable.
  
  After discovering the fact that this company was operating in a mobile sense (and soon to be online), we met with Patrick at a place of my choice and he brought his laptop. He was very accommodating and informative while patiently processing our information.

  I would recommend this company to anyone wanting to avoid the hectic mad dash that is tax time. These guys will come to your home or anywhere else, minimizing the stress that is usually involved.

Just had my taxes done by KH Financial, and I have to say, it was the best decision I have made. Last year another company did my taxes, they promised good service but I was greatly disappointed, since it took 3 weeks for them to do my tax and they made mistakes. Searching for a new company is also filled with uncertainty, and personal taxes, well you just need to make sure the person doing your taxes knows what they are doing.  
I looked on line, checked reviews and decided to try KH Financial. I called Patrick, left a message, and he was prompt to call back and arrange a meeting. 

Patrick is 100% professional, knowledgeable and I would highly recommend using KH Financial. I took Patrick's card and have quickly advised my circle of friends and family. Hassle free taxes, good advise, and superior service just call Patrick....!!
Patrick was very prompt to reply and provided useful guidance to help me complete my tax return. Highly recommend his service!

Patrick knows his stuff, provides amazing customer service and doesn't charge an arm and a leg. Indisputable 5 stars.

I called Patrick on the Sunday before the filing deadline in a  bit of panic. Thankfully he was able to accommodate my schedule and agreed to come to my house at about 9:00 pm.

He was on time, and in very good spirits even though he had a very busy day. He explained things well although a bit too fast. I guess he had been repeating himself the entire day.

Patrick's calculations were corroborated to the T by the government. I am very impressed. 

I hope his business grows by leaps and bounds.

I was so nervous about getting my taxes done for a variety of reasons- but Patrick was incredibly patient, kind and managed everything with speed, efficiency and incredible grace.  He has an authentic passion for the work he does, and it shows not only in the quality of the work he does, but in the enthusiasm he was able to create even for someone as leery and innumerate as myself. Cannot. Recommend. Him. Enough.

It was my first time filing taxes so, initially, I went to HR block, but faced unprofessionalism and total misunderstanding on the other part of the table.
On the other hand, KH Financial understood at once what was required and kept everything professional. Fantastic experience. All communication was via email only. Very fast responses. Everything was done online: sending files, signing, paying - very convenient for me. 

Definitely recommend. Thank you, guys!

In the beginning, Patrick was great. We hired him last year to handle the bookkeeping, accounting and corporate/HST taxes for our small business.

However, not long after he started working with us, things began to slide. He was unable to keep our books up to date or accurate and kept pushing us off for his other clients. We tried to be understanding, but it was incredibly unprofessional.

As we got further and further behind, it really began to affect our business because we couldn't make solid financial decisions. We had no financial data! Our accountant had completely fallen off the map! The person we trusted the most with our most precious part of the business was useless to us. We thought our finances were fine (based on what we could see in Quickbooks, that should have been current) and made a purchase decision that has now come back to haunt us, and jeopardize the stability of the company.

Patrick was supposed to do our 2015 taxes (corporate, personal and HST). He got the personal ones done, but never provided us the paperwork for our records. He *started* on the corporate taxes, but never filed them OR the HST. It is now August 2016 and he has not filed ANYTHING for our company! It should have been done in December 2015. We now have penalties to pay to the CRA due to his negligence, and also higher fees from our new accountants to try and sort out his mess.

We have been so flexible and understanding with "KH Financial" and Patrick, however since December he has not been communicating with us at all. He doesn't respond to emails or phone calls anymore. We are desperate to get our finances in order because he basically ruined our company with his negligence. We trusted him. If he couldn't handle our business he should have told us much sooner, and cooperated with our new accountants rather than ghosting us like a bad date.

We are incredibly disappointed in him and his services. I didn't want to have to write this review, but it's just gotten to that point. I cannot in good conscience recommend Patrick Payne or KH Financial for any kind of business or personal service.

I used to do my own taxes as it was pretty straight forward, but last year i became self-employed and I didn't want to mess up, or lose out on, some potential claims/benefits etc. I did a good ole Google search and came across KH Financial's Yelp reviews. Seeing as how they had amassed a pretty loyal following, i decided to give them a try. As you can tell from my rating above, I was very happy i did.
Patrick came down to meet me right by my office, so i didn't lose any time in transit and was able to spend more time with him. Patrick took me through my return and my wife's return and arranged our expenses and claims in such a way so as to get the greatest benefit. He also spent a lot of time with me preparing me for the upcoming year. He talked me through all the things I should be preparing for as a newly self-employed person. He gave me some great advice and shared with me some useful software tools that will help me to keep track of my expenses throughout the year. Never once did Patrick look at his watch, he just sat and talked to me until all my questions were answered. He is a very friendly and professional accountant, who knows his stuff and also knows the value of great customer service.
It has been 10 days since my appointment with him and my tax return is already sitting in my bank account waiting to be spent!!
I would highly recommend using KH Financial and i am even looking forward to the next tax-season (how many times have you ever said that in your life?)

Thanks Patrick, see you next year!

Not a lot to say. Numbers are either right or wrong. These guys get their numbers right. I've gotten back about $6,000 in taxes so far. Rates for personal taxes are super affordable and well worth it for the extra knowledge you'll gain. Patrick at KH was easy to deal with. I ended up recommending him to my mother for her personal finances when my father passed away and she was happy as well.
Patrick provides a no fuss service and explains the taxation rules very well! Great for students like me.

Tax prep made easy, thanks to Patrick! He was kind, super knowledgeable and took the time to explain everything that we were confused about- plus he give us helpful tips for how to manage our personal and business finances. Absolutely nothing negative to say -- I highly recommend KH Financial if you prefer to have someone come to your home to save you time and find you money.

Having Patrick walk us through our taxes this year was the best decision we made. 

My husband and I typically do our own taxes, but this year things were a little more complicated. We had Patrick go through our personal returns, take a look at our investments, and also work through my new small business files to make sure that our returns were completed properly. 

Patrick sent us a list of the documents we should have on hand, and came and met us near our home in the evening. In just over an hour we had everything thoroughly examined and filed.

We were extremely pleased with our experience using KH Financial and for the price, they can not be beat. We'll definitely be returning again next year at tax time!

Thanks Patrick!

Patrick came by the office and consulted with me on how to best setup the accounting systems for my small business.   His advice was easy to understand and  timely.   We're looking forward to working with Patrick on an ongoing basis.  Give him a call!

I needed to do some catch up on my taxes... and I didn't really want to go to H&R Block. I figured I'd try someone else out...

Patrick was super friendly and helpful. Very prompt and knowledgable. He got my caught up on my taxes and gave me some sound advice for the future.

He also gave me his card and told me to contact him if I have any questions or concerns in the future!

ALSO he came and met me wherever, super nifty and handy!
Patrick did a great job for me on my taxes this year. I just recommended him to a friend.

After many years, I decided to switch accountants as my former one was in a different city. At first I was nervous as to whether it would be complicated with a new accountant. As a self employed person, walk in places don't cut it, a friend of mine recommended KH Finacial and after an in person consult with Patrick who was very patient with my questions and knowledgeable about my needs, I decided to make the switch. This has been my first year using KH Financial and I found it to be far more convenient than I imagined possible. This company comes to you! So handy and efficient, and the same price as my former tax guy. I was able to get everything done sitting with my new accountant in about an hour, my results came back immediately and I was even able to pay for his services using his mobile debit machine. If you like simplicity and convenience this is an excellent company to work with.

Great and friendly services. Low fees, Great customer services.
They answered fast and took the time to understand my issues and helped me resolve the problem.

This company is awful! Not only are their services overpriced they have horrible customer service when you have issues. Not only that, read the fine print. They will charge you a $595 Cancellation fee among the other $60 in fees you will receive monthly over what you sign up for. Stay Away from this Company!!

Overall, Wells Fargo is a decent bank. This location is absolutely horrific. I deposited a large check yesterday and was informed that there would be 3 separate holds placed due to the large amount. According to the receipt I received, $200 would be available after overnight processing. The next amount would be credited after 2 business days, and the remainder after 7. This morning, I checked my account and somehow they managed to make my account close to 15k negative! I called customer service immediately and was informed they could do nothing and the branch was solely responsible. Here I sit, waiting for them to solve this mystery, and still I will have to wait to receive my money. Banks hold large amounts in the federal reserve for the interest they accrue. It only takes 24 hours for a local check to be transferred to the appropriate institution. While there have been regulations enforced to limit the hold time, this is ridiculous. Long story short, unless making a quick stop to use the ATM, avoid this branch altogether.

I've banked with Wells for well over 10 years including checking, savings and a home mortgage. By having the mortgage with them and keeping a reasonable minimum balance I get all my banking for free.   Wells has great online banking options and a very good mobile app.   I also love that there is a branch on every corner in Las Vegas.   

Over the years I've had little glitches with them here and there, but they fixed the problems quickly and without hassle.  There is not perfect bank (or any other business) but I think Wells does a great job at keeping customers happy.

THIS PLACE IS A DUMP!
I'm outta here!
The customer service at this location is left up to be desired. I know little kids who have more customer service in their pinky than the agents.

Nice helpful staff behind the counter.

However, if you want to open an account, they have a special person. Real special. Key parts of the conversation, as best as I remember
HSBC "How can I help?"
Me "Want to open a GBP Savings account"
HSBC "Do you know the features of the account?"
Me "Yes. No fees. Pays interest. Can only access the monies in-branch."
HSBC then proceeded to detail the features not available on this account.......going on, and on..........until we moved onto another topic.
HSBC "We need to know why you are opening an account"
Me "Expect some money from the UK. Not sure when."
HSBC "Need to know where the money is from, if it is a large amount. There is a form"
Me "What is a large amount?"
HSBC "4,000 OR 5,000 OR 6,000"
Me "So if the amount is 4,000 then I need to declare the source. But not if it is less?"
HSBC with more vague specifics on the amount .........and then the process....... no matter how I asked a question.
Me "Cannot do business with an organization that cannot answer simple questions."
And I left.
45mins of my life wasted.
Yes. The above conversation took that long. 

Funny part is, I had to go to TD afterwards to open another type of account. Done in 15mins, from start to finish. And it was a pleasure!
Guess which organization will continue to get my business.

For Insurance I don't think it gets better than Anthem BCBS.  I've been a fan for a long time and haven't had any INS issues.  You get what you pay for and as long as you know how to use your insurance the correct way then you shouldn't have a problem.

Back in February my husband called Anthem to specifically ask who to use for his COPD supplies.  He was told Apria was in  network and to use them.  Then Anthem decided Apria wasn't in network and denied the claims.  Fortunately for us they had put in the "notes" that they told him Apria was in network.  That's when the fun started.  We paid the Apria bills then realized Anthem considered them out of network and Anthem did not pay anything.  In July we started calling Anthem, to find out why they were considering Apria out of network when they told us they were in network in February, always getting someone different, but to their credit, they did document all conversations in the "notes".  Of course we always got a different answer from everyone.  One rep told us we were owed over $800, and two different checks were being sent.  They never arrived.  Back on the phone.  Another rep said Apria had been paid and WE had to get Apria to pay us.  Really--for Anthem's mistake we now had to chase down Aprina--I think not.  It's now October and we are no closer to receiving the money owed.  We are now dealing with a supervisor, who says she will call back, but of course doesn't.  We went thru all the statements from Anthem and the bills from Apria--we now have a good idea what we are owed.  Guess what, the rep that said we were owed $800 was right!  Will we ever see the monies owed, yes!  We will keep on calling, on a daily basis if need be, until we get what is owed.  The next step is a letter to the Attorney General and the Insurance Board.  Anthem is holding our money.  If we owed Anthem money, we'd be in collections by now.  

In addition, we just received a letter raising premiums 20% and cutting benefits 20% for 2017.  We have Anthem Silver Pathway PPO individual insurance as we are both self-employed and not old enough for Medicare.

Any way I paid them I tried to wheel and deal some of them off. After about 30 days of negotiating. I finally got a rep to off  take of $35.00. She said that I have to call back as soon as my payment clears and she will gladly remove them. 

I called back and no one, I mean no one had any record of this conversation. I was so upset. I thought surely I would be SOL.
 
After about 2 months of being in debt for $35.00, I finally decided to file a complaint with the CFPB and......

Walaaa they removed the fees.

Kanetix is an amazing insurance quote service.  It was easy to use and I ended up with a $150/month auto insurance policy from BelAir Direct.  If I had bundled my other insurance with BelAir I could have gotten a policy even lower than what Kanetix originally quoted.  I would highly recommend Kanetix to anyone buying car insurance.

I experienced the same thing as the previous poster.  The lowest quoted rate was for their own "KTX Insurance" - which then, after agreeing orally to the rate over the phone, proceeded to bill me a higher rate and sent me a contract with inaccurate information on it, expecting me to sign.  Beware.

Before I give my review on Kanetix.ca, I just want to say that most people who know me know that I love to shop. I will literally shop till I drop (I have if you don't believe me! LOL) However, if there is one thing that I love equally as much as shopping is saving money, because lets get real who doesn't like to save money...especially when shopping? 
 
Recently, I had the awful experience of being notified of a significant increase to my car insurance rates by my current insurance provider and I was wondering how I was going to come up with the extra money. I had heard of the company 'Kanetix' on the radio while driving in the car with a friend, and she highly recommended them. I just thought they had a funny name. She mentioned that her Dad told her about it after he used them to get cheaper car and travel insurance and had a great experience with them.
 
As usual, I went and checked Yelp to see if there were any reviews. There was one with only 1 star, but I decided to check them out for myself because my good friend and her Dad, that I trust, used Kanetix and said it was simply the best. 
 
Needless to say, I went to their website and completed a "Quote Comparison in 3 Easy Steps". It was actually easy!! To my surprise after about 5ish min of filling out the application, I was given about 7 rates for my car insurance. After this, I called the number provided and was transferred through to the insurer. I ended up getting a new policy that was $235 cheaper!!! Meaning I now have $235 more to shop with ;)
 
Overall, I would definitely recommend Kanetix!
