He took the time to listen to my questions regarding my new business venture and gave me direction on how to document my expenses and income for the coming year.  He was quick to respond to emails and phone calls.  I highly recommend his services to anyone.  Thanks Greg!

Greg is an amazing CPA. After thoroughly examining a multitude of accounting firms across the valley, we decided to go with Greg/Integra Accounting PLLC. I have a small ecommerce business that had a lot of complications, disorganized bookkeeping, and a plethora of transactions spanning almost a year. Greg was more than happy to help me out with every aspect of my business' accounting. He not only fixed our books, legally saved us money, and build a excellent bookkeeping system, but also goes above and beyond for us constantly. I highly recommend Greg whether you are self-employed or a considerably large business. Because of Greg, I can continue to build my business with confidence!
Greg is extremely knowledgable and helpful.  Work was completed promptly and correctly.  Highly recommended for taxes, payroll, and any accounting need for the small business owner!

I'd recommend going elsewhere.  I reached out to this company and they weren't the least bit interested in new clients, said they weren't available for even a consultation for several months, and wanted to charge me just to discuss what I needed.

In the past two weeks I have had the absolute WORST experience of my life with Chase Bank.The short story is DO NOT BANK WITH CHASE!

 Last week right before I was leaving to go on vacation at 5am I used my card to fill up my gas. It declined three times before I called to figure out what was wrong. After a 10 min. wait to talk to someone they said they cancelled my card. NO ONE  contacted me. The lady was so rude. She said that there was nothing I could do except wait for the card in the mail. (Erin from San Antonio calling center) Or I could call EVERY SINGLE time I made a purchase while I was on vacation. How inconvenient is that?! Who wants to call every 10 minutes, and then wait a half hour to talk to someone to get a charge approved? No one! I asked her for a direct number to call so I wouldn't get the run around on the customer service menu. She told me the number but I was driving so I asked her if she could email me the number. (Reasonable request right?) NO she told there was NO email in her office. I asked if she couldn't email me, or if there was absolutely no email at all in her office. Erin then replied that there was NO form of email in her office and there was nothing she could do. Imagine that, Chase National Bank with no email at all? What a liar, I get emails all the time from Chase. So I went in saying how that seemed completely ridiculous and theres no possible way that was true. I asked if she never got any departmental emails, or her work schedule sent to her... again she said NO. After talking to this hyaenas woman she transferred me to someone else while she stayed on the line. Cindy got on the line and the first question I asked was if she email in her office. Her answer was simple and sweet YES. So of course I was immediately furious. Cindy followed up by saying they were not allowed to email customers directly but the damage was done. I understand the rule completely but for Erin to lie over and over seemed so disrespectful like I am so stupid to believe you don't have email?! After the fact Erin could not even admit she had lied. I told her I would not move forward discussing the original reason why I called until she could admit she had lied. She didn't for another half hour until I got hung up on! The entire call Erin kept talking over me and was so so so rude. I thought that was the worst customer service ever! However I was wrong. 
It is a week and a half later and I have not received my new card. (Go figure) so I had to call Chase once more. The guy named Derek told me to get a new card I'd have to wait 5-7 business days or go into a chase store and wait 15 min for a new card. I explained to him that the card should've already been at my door so I did not want to go all the way down to the branch to fix THEIR mistake! he said thats ok then it will take 5-7 business days. I asked if there was any way to get the card sooner. He said NO. All I could do was go down to the branch. After going back and forth about the poor quality of customer service he said there was a 2 day shipping option but it would cost me $5. (So he lied. There was another option) I explained to him that I shouldn't be charged for my card getting shipped when they had already shut down my card for almost two weeks.He told me there was nothing he could do to remove the charge. He said once the charge was made I could call back and have the charged removed. I told him I DO NOT TRUST THIS COMPANY AT ALL and I would not trust them to take off the charge at a later date. Besides whats the difference between taking the charge off, and never charging me to begin with? He said well let me see what I can do... He then said he found away to remove the charge on his end. (Again another lie, he knew how to do it and just told me there was nothing he could do.) 
So now my card will hopefully be here in two days but if I am not sitting at home all day waiting to pick it up UPS will not leave it at the door, I will then have to go pick it up from the store. 

Moral of the story DO NOT BANK WITH CHASE unless you want to be lied to over and over, spend hours on the phone talking to disrespectful "customer service" agents who can not do anything, have your money held hostage, and want to pay money to have Chase fix their own mistakes.
I can't believe that these are the idiots I have been trusting with my money. Needless to say I will be closing my account and banking with someone who is smarter and has a caring customer service team.

First of all, I can't find good customer service one the North East side of Las Vegas !!!!! I had being near the darn base! 

EVERYTIME!!!! And I mean every time I go to this location , something is wrong with the ATM machines. Yesterday, all but one machine was working ! One!!! The line was crazy long because it was Friday. Today, I was depositing a check and the machines could not desperate cash. What the heck?!

The employees at the counter have never been very friendly and willing to help at this location. 

I love have Chase and is my favorite bank I have worked with. However, this location needs to get their act together now! Everyone is always complaining about this location and rightfully so!

A customer of "AmFam" backed into my car on February 2nd.  It is now March 12th and my car is STILL in the shop due to the lack of customer service at "AmFam".  
The other party admitted fault and AmFam agreed to the inital estimate amount.  After supplemental damage was found, AmFam started dragging their feet.  They gave my mechanic the wrong fax number to submit the report and then said they never received it.  There goes another week.  All the while, NO ONE from AmFam has contacted me.  My claims adjuster NEVER answers her phone and has a 5 day turn around to call me back.  Another week later, still no check for the supplemental damage.  My car has now moved back in production at the shop due to the stall at insurance.  Now, they claim to have issued a check and mailed it two weeks ago??  Lies, deception, BAD customer service.  AVOID them if at all possible.

I recently had a flood in my tenants basement which did enough water damage to justify a claim. I've never filed a homeowner's claim before and have had AFI for over 10 years on this property. After paying out $2700 for the damage, they immediately dropped me with a 2 week notice to find another insurance company. I've paid them over $12,000 in the past 10 years of owning this property without EVER filing a claim. Their "reason" for dropping? They claim they did not know this property was not owner-occupied. Pretty lame excuse I think. Stay away from this company. I plan to drop their coverage on my other properties as well (that I have NEVER filed a claim against) since this company doesn't stand behind their insured and will find any reason to drop you should they deem it necessary. I plan to use Farmer's Insurance for my rentals since I also have that on my primary residence. They are a great company.

This is not about my former agent so much as the adjusters, therefore I'm attaching this review to corporate headquarters rather than his agency listing.. I had an accident and my car is no longer young so I was not surprised that it would technically be totaled though I knew it could be fixed. What was surprising and infuriating was the poor service in the claims process. The adjuster did not look at my car within 48 hours as promised. When I finally got it, I felt the first settlement offer was low, I could even find an nearly identical car on Car Soup selling for $500 more. Furthermore, I had been taking care of my car it had recently had a new head gasket, new tires and new stereo.  None of this mattered to the adjusters( and I did take this up the management chain)  they basically refused to negotiate, saying they would lower their offer rather than raise it. Since I have relatives who are adjusters , I know this is not how it should go. I also did not get a written copy of the  repair estimate until 12 days after the accident. 

The good news for me is that I found a great body shop that fixed my car and wonderful insurance agent at another company.

I called the Pew Law Center after several 40 minute consultations while I was shopping around for an attorney, and I informed them that I did not wish to endure another consultation and just wanted to know their fees. They were completely ridiculous and refused to give me any information without one, so I grudgingly made a phone appointment. I later decided that I didn't feel like wasting my time with their office when ALL I wanted was a price, and no one would give me one. After awhile 40 minute conversations about stresses and finances start to get depressing, you know? I knew from my previous appointments with other attorneys EXACTLY what I wanted and that I qualify for it, and these guys are treating me like I'm totally incompetent. 

NOPE. The Pew Law Center REFUSES to be ignored! So far, I have received at LEAST 15 phone calls, 2 letters, and multiple emails. They will not leave me alone! 

By the way, I was able to figure out via Yelp that they are actually the most expensive office that I have been interviewing, but have the poorest reviews. It's sad that I have so many people hounding me, but paying clients can't even get anyone to answer their emails. It's obvious this place is just a money making machine and nothing else.

In the beginning it seemed to be great.  They went into detail what would happen.  After setting up a payment plan it went downhill from there.  In trying to make payments to get things started I have been completely ignored.  Out of 5 calls leaving messages I have not received one call back or message that they called.  It seems like I am just another number in their wallet.  Not pleased overall.

If there was an option to give negative stars, I would. Here's the story. In 2013 I was suckered into signing a contract by this sales man who wasn't even part of the legal team but some hot blooded car dilership material who was so pushy about bankruptcy promising life changing experience. So I signed it, on behalf of my husband. Two months after we paid the full deposit, a bunch of his old debt disappeared from his credit report, I mean more than 90% of it. ( we still had to pay tax on it!!!!) So we waited, and 2 years later he is left with about 4k to pay off. We never gave them any paperwork to work on nor we called to ask for advise. For the past two weeks we have been calling and leaving numerous voicemails, yet we didn't receive a call back. A judgement was filled and my husbands wages are being garnished. I walked into the office to drop of the paperwork for the garnishment hoping attorney could take a look at it and see if he could stop it and negotiate a settlement if we paid a smaller amount in full. The receptionist said the only way to stop it is to file. Seriously? To file BK for $ 4,000.00 debt???!!! Or I could call myself and see if that creditor would be willing to do it. Well that's way I paid attorney, to do it for me, so I wouldn't have to deal with these things myself! So, we decided to cancel their service and today I finally talked to Brock Best and he said that he cannot refund me ANY money because of their services such as answering the questions and stuff like that. I told him I never called them about anything and that I was promised , and I truly was, if I ever decided to break the contract I would have to pay admin fee plus hourly rate for attorney that he spent working on my case which was ZERO in my case. Brock Best told me something new today he said there's nothing to refund, it costs you $125  a month to retain us under the claw "x" and that's much more than $2650 that we put as a deposit leading me to belive that he doesn't need to do a thing for us because it turns out that the cost of retaining his services exceeded the cost of deposit. What a bunch of crap. Nobody ever made me feel so helpless and robbed as he did today. It wasn't easy to pay him $2650 and today he used his status of attorney to make me feel like he knows better and that I can't do anything about it.  I'm so mad. Wish I never dealt with Pew Law Center.There are so many other things he could had suggested such as writing a hardship letter saying that the wage garnishment would cause us hardship , there are ways to stop it but since he already collected our money he isn't interested in our case anymore. I know I am venting right now, but if you are trying to find a good attorney , please avoid these scammers because they do not care about you. They are heartless and have no interest in your case, they would never give you a professional advise that works in your best interest but what's easiest to them. Look further, avoid Pew Law Center.

Pew Law Center seems wonderful at first, but goes downhill. My fiancé was left with a significant amount of debt following a divorce. He contacted Pew, set up an appointment,  met with them, and set up a payment plan. Everything seemed great! Following completing the payments, no one had contacted him to begin the process. He had contacted them several times via phone and email with no luck. Several MONTHS following the completion of payments went by before he heard anything, which he only heard from them after deciding it was too late to file bankruptcy due to the wedding. Then they attempt to convince him to continue to file,  as bad as a used car salesman. Out of the $2000 he paid them he got around $200 back because of "administrative" fees. They did NOTHING in the time he was paying them. Very poor customer service. They even suggested putting getting a marriage license on hold, are you kidding me?! So all the money that has been spent on the wedding would be a waste because they require a marriage license. I am really disappointed in Pew Law Center. They fooled him into something and refuse to make their failure in communication right. I highly encourage others to look elsewhere for debt relief. If this review would have been written in the beginning it would have  been completely different. Their true side didn't come out until later on! 

I will give credit where it's due though, the tax department was great! They worked with him and his situation for a much more positive outcome than expected.  

They should have made their mistake right and feelings would likely have been different as well, but their lack of communication and incredible difficulty getting a hold of them was detrimental.  

Please look elsewhere when it comes to debt relief. Save yourself from what we have lost!

Horrible people to deal with, once they have your money, good luck trying to contact your attorney.  Keep calling, no responses.  They lie to you if you finally get a hold of someone.  They lose your paperwork, not much more can I say about them.  Stay away, stay far far away!

CONS:  

- Wait time

- Was lied to about not only my appointment time but also why I wasn't seen on time. I had 2 different people give me B.S. stories that were so obviously fake. Was seen almost 50 minutes past my appt time.

- Person I spoke to was a goofy guy who first insulted the part of town I live in, then proceeded to do the kind of sales pressure and pitch you expect on a used car lot.  Tried to tell me that paying the fees for bankruptcy is like investing in your future - better than stocks or bonds.  Seriously?  Then gave me moderate pressure to sign up then and there for a payment plan until I told him NO, I wouldn't be making any final decisions today

- They pretty much wouldn't answer several of my questions without me paying them first to retain their services. So much for the FREE consult where you are encouraged to ask questions.

This place is like the Midway Cheverolet of law offices.  Stay away from here please!  Their low rating is completely earned.  They are a churn and burn place that does not respect you or your time. They just want their $2100.00 fees. Wished I looked them up on Yelp first before driving 40 miles to their stinky offices.

PROS:

????????????????

I have been using nevada state bank for years and for the most part I get great service.  Ashlee the bank manager always takes care of me in this branch.  She is wonderful to work with.   Banks as everyone knows are difficult unless u have a lot of money.
Want to be inconvenienced? Pay lots of fees? Want the worst customer service possible? Well come to this bank.

Poor customer service! I could hear the tellers telling each other to take me, one closed her window and walked away, so the other teller with a long face made me wait a few min before helping me. She was very dry and not very helpful.

I highly recommend Fox Peterson! Of course tax season is nerve racking and makes you a little nervous. They take care of you and take the stress off of you as well. It is easy to get an appointment and you are in and out of there quickly. Also I'd like to add they are much more inexpensive than H&R Block and other tax services like that. H&R Block wanted to charge me $500 to prepare my taxes and Fox and Peterson only charged me $160.00. They have done my taxes for the last few years now. They build personal relationships with their clientele so that always makes your visits even more comfortable and less stressful. If you are in the beauty business Tyson is the one to talk too, he specializes in that area of taxes. If you ever need anything throughout the year they are always there to answer your phone calls or emails.

Clark Fox has done our taxes for the last 7 years. We were new to this city and state and when we sat down with him we felt like we were being helped by family. He does a great job every time we sit down together. He is ethical and principled and still finds every possible dollar that is available. I have never hesitated, nor will I ever hesitate recommending Clark Fox to anyone!

Fox Peterson is a fantastic team to work with! I've known them to be a part of the community for a long time but this was my first experience doing business with them. Tyson Haws was able to help me get my business taxes filed in a very short period of time and make the deadline. I was so impressed, that I'll be using them to file my personal returns going forward. People joke that I'm difficult to please, but they provided an experience that left me extremely happy. Taxes aren't as painful as I have known them to be. I'll be telling all my friends about Fox Peterson.
-Dusty

Are you kidding me Dusty........

I have attempted to change my address and payment information for several months, only to call each month and make another attempt to change.....

I call today and find out that my insurance was cancelled over a month ago for non-payment.........WTF........Statefarm........Take care of YOUR customers and get rid of the flaky agents.........

eSurance........I don't need human error causing me problems......

I wish I could give more stars for Bay Equity. Talk about a team that really goes above and beyond. Jessica Pingleton, Adam and Hannah Boles are beyond amazing. They held my hand through the whole process. They made this whole process so easy on us and put up with all of our changes. If you are looking for help with a home loan do not hesitate to call the A-TEAM. Wonderful people to work with! I highly recommend BAY Equity! Thank you again you Jessica,Adam and Hannah!!!

We recently closed a home refinance with Adam and his team. The entire process went very smoothly and communication was proactive. This is our second loan closed with Bay Equity and we will use them again in the future. Highly recommend this firm!

It was a pleasure to do business with Lareme from Canyon Land Insurance.  After shopping online for weeks I was chasing my tail finding homeowner rates from $1000 to $1500 a year.  With one simple phone call to Lareme he did all the leg work for me.  He found me better coverage for less the $500.00 a year.  If you are in the need of insurance I would highly recommend Lareme and his company.

I've used Lareme for at least a few years.  I'd say that one thing that makes him unique is how well he listens to your needs and concerns.  He is also great at giving you options and explaining what's important in selecting a policy and saves me stress and time researching what's important on my own.  I highly recommend him and have used them for my place, rental and auto.  Give him a shot and I'm confident that you'll have a great experience.

Terrie Kolker has been my insurance agent for a few years now. Whenever I have had questions about my insurance, she is quick to respond.
She and her team have always helped me get competitive rates on my insurance too!
These guys are great. I have used both Pekin and Progressive insurance through them.

Terrie Kolker is an excellent insurance advisor. She is very knowledgeable and straightforward. She understands how to properly protect people and their assets to reduce liability. I know several financial advisors who have been happy referring their clients to her and she has been successful maintaining their same coverage while reducing premiums.

This is my first yelp review and am unfortunately doing it because I want to steer people far, far from this business. I just left this h&r block after experiencing the worst customer service, unprofessional ism, and rudest confrontation I have ever experienced in my life as a customer. What started as a very unfortunate situation was just worsend by the staff there, including the store manger John Broad. I had my taxes done by a rep there who quoted me a rate, which I paid, but then said I could pick up the rest of my paperwork the following day (an amendment to last years return). I had been there for the second time for 2 hours and 45 minutes as she completed my return so I appreciated that I could leave (after paying $400) and return to pick up my final portion. I called everyday after that to find out if it was ready to be picked up and almost a week later I got the awful news she had passed away. I understood these workers had lost a co-worker and the completion of my taxes would take a little longer than I expected. After offering to go elsewhere I was booked to pick up the amendment today, a week after originally planned.. They tried to charge me an additional $100 for this portion when my tax rep had told me it was included in the amount I paid at my appointment and I could just pick up the paperwork. I informed them of this and they looked up the information from my bill and said she didn't make note of this. I  reinforced  that I had already paid and she said I wouldn't owe anything more. 2 employees (including the store owner)  proceeded to yell at me that she would never say this, that they have worked with her before and this would never happen, and they couldn't believe I would take advantage of a situation like this. I was appalled by these accusations and their clear disinterest in any sort of customer service or for standing by the verbal agreement between me and one of their employees. This was an attack on my character and went way beyond any tax return discussion. I am an honest, hard working customer that deserves to be treated a whole lot better. Needless to say, after 3 weeks of working with them I refused to pay the $100 and left without my paperwork in tears. I found this office came far from delivering on their satisfaction guarantee and I hope  to have it somewhat rectified at the regional level. I would never step foot in this place of business again. Zero stars.
I would give H&R Block 10 stars! Especially Janet :) they are available year round, fast efficient and so friendly! Thanks for another great return
I love Tiffany & her husband. They are very detailed & explain everything so that I can understand it. I wouldn't use anyone else!

We have been a small business for 13 years and have had many CPA's, Accountants, Bookkeepers, etc.. None compare to Sapphire. We were behind in our internal accounting/tax/bookkeeping efforts, after firing our last "Scottsdale" accountant who we were paying a big premium. With our business feild, we know when someone has the knowledge and when someone is just faking it. Sapphire is the real deal and they can usually answer any question without looking it up. I found them on Yelp a year ago and it was the best find ever. Within a few weeks, they had us completely organized and up to date. 
They send us reminders about payroll, they help with QB support, they just do everything and I don't have to worry anymore. They save me so much time that I can now focus more on my business and not on taxes, bookkeeping, etc..  If you are in need of a tax or accounting help, call them. I have referred family and friends to them and all have come back and thanked me. They are REALLY that GOOD! It is the personalized service that sets them apart and that their rates are so reasonable! And it is always nice to do business with a family owned business. I could go on and on.... Just call them. You will be as glad as I was. I cant believe I got this excited about bookkeeping and taxes, but they are totally worth it and I guess I am just so happy to finally find someone that is reliable, knowledgeable and that I trust.

I can't say enough about what Sapphire Bookkeeping has done for our family's tax prep! We were so disorganized and always late until we found Sapphire. In one year Tiffany has totally transformed the way we approach our taxes and even makes the process enjoyable! The ability to work over email with everthing digital makes tax time the easiest it can be. Any individual or family who needs help with their taxes should hire Sapphire.

Been using Sapphire Bookkeeping for my personal and our business almost 2 years now. Fast, efficient, QuickBooks gurus, friendly, courteous and knowledgeable. Thanks Jon and Tiffany! Larry w Az Floor Company

I was looking to change accountants and reached out to Sapphire accounting to file my 2013 taxes. Tiffany was extremely professional. knowledgeable and on the ball. She was accommodating to my schedule, and turned around my filing in record time. I highly recommend Sapphire for their professional attitude and great service.

Sapphire did a fantastic job on our taxes. Tiffany made me feel extremely comfortable. After working with several CPA's, Accountants and Bookkeepers over the last 20+ years we have finally found one that works for us! 
Thank you for your patience in answering all my questions and for doing such a fantastic job on our business and personal taxes. 
Don't feel embarrassed to bring in "your box" of goodies...Tiffany will sort it all out graciously so you can sleep at night too! 

Thank you again, Sheri and Chris

Tiffany was amazing at helping me and my husband do our taxes. We own a small business and she got us the first return we had seen in 7 years. She was very practical when instructing us in the smartest way to pay toward the next tax year and didn't charge us an arm and a leg to do it. She told us what we could do feasibly to help prepare them and then took over to do the rest of the work that would have caused us major headaches. I am grateful we found Sapphire Bookkeeping and would recommend them to anyone. They made the process of hiring an accountant affordable, stress free, and always were prompt answering questions. If you're on the fence please look at these reviews and consider them seriously for your tax needs. We had a great experience!
Tiffany is amazing! We greatly appreciate their help with correcting our taxes and filing. Great service, Knowledgable and professional.

I feel like when I'm in a pinch, YELP really comes through for me.  I was looking to switch accountants for my tax prep this year.  I initially asked a bunch of friends and colleagues but was not sold on any one that they suggested (mostly b/c the rates would have been as much as my State return).  I found Sapphire after requested quotes on YELP.  Jonathan was very timely with email correspondence and I was able to schedule an appointment within a couple of days *in the last week in March!
I could tell immediately I was going to like this business when they presented me with an invoice of the work they would do and the fees upfront.  I can't tell you how many times I've asked an accountant what the rate would be...I get one number and then after the work is done..I'm shell shocked with a bill that is twice as much if not more.  
Cindy did my tax prep.  She was very personable and knowledgeable.  If she didn't have an immediate answer to my question, she knew where to find it and did so in a timely manner.  I have to say, this was probably the easiest and smoothest experience I've ever had with an accountant.  Highly, highly, highly recommend!

What can I say? Sapphire Bookkeeping is AMAZING! 
Efficient knowledgeable and overall the best you can get. I love working with Tiffany, and don't know where I would be without her. She helps keep my small business in order, and organized. She is super helpful when I have a question or need assistance. Tiffany runs everything very professionally keeping me on track, and I can't thank her enough for everything she has helped me with. Tiffany knows her stuff, and is there to help you along every step of the way!

I'm seriously getting a refund! 3 years In a row I've had to pay back. Not this time. Cindy was super nice and very knowledgable. She explained a ton and made great recommendations for my next year withholdings. I'm seriously considering having Cindy check out the last 3 years to see if I'm owed a refund. Good service, location and customer service. What else can you ask for.
Ruth Benjamin has been very helpful threw our move and changing our insurance policy. She has answered all questions we had. So far no complaints.

As a part of purchasing my home mortgage through Howard Hanna I bundled my insurance through Howard Hanna / Encompass.  I have been very satisfied with their service.  I appreciate the online payment options and how home, auto, catastrophe is all bundled into one.  Numerous benefits are applied to my annual payment related to auto type, driving history, bundled payments, etc and I'm very thankful for what I pay here in Ohio.  Having lived elsewhere including Maryland, NJ and PA, having had several other insurance companies including GEICO, I have been much happier with the customer service, friendly quick personalized replies received through Howard Hanna.

I have used Howard Hanna Insurance for my home and auto since I bought my house four years ago. I have consistency had good service. When I had a flooding issue in my basement 2-3 years ago they quickly responded and were extremely good at resolving the issue. In the end the damages were extensive and we had to have the sewer piping in our finished basement and garage dug up and replaced. They negotiated with a contractor to get this repair completed and the basement was finished to a high quality standard. This included painting walls, and new carpet and floor tiles. Their auto insurance has always been very responsive to my inquires.

Great team with awesome service! They have helped with all my accounting needs- large and small. I appreciate the guidance and support that Deirdre provides when making business decisions. I Highly recommend BASC Expertise!
I highly recommend Basc for all your accounting needs! They are professional and courteous and can put your mind at ease during tax season, thanks basc!

BASC seemed great at the start  which justified the high price, however it took weeks for them to even start on our project. Communication was frustratingly slow and disorganized. Finally after months of of this we asserted our concerns to the owner and asked to get things in track. Deidre, the owners response was quitting our project which resulted in missed deadlines and fees. 
Since that time we found a great firm for half the cost.

Excellent service, friendly, professional, and maintain great communication with me as a client.

I wouldn't trust anyone else but Deirdre at BASC. 

If I could give them 6 stars I would!
Don't bank here they are crooks . Payed my bill early and chase lost the payment stupid people work here go to Wells Fargo they are more professional

I went here to discuss some account options for myself and was helped by a rep by the name of Anh. She was very helpful and informative. The branch seemed decent and everyone was very professional. We recently switched to State Farm after working with our previous insurance company for many years mainly because the price quote we received was better than what we had.  The service provided by this insurance agent was impeccable.  We met with them or talked with them on the phone numerous times and they were always friendly and very helpful.  If they could not answer a question immediately, they would find out the answer and get back to us in a timely manner.  The entire staff is welcoming and accommodating.  I would highly recommend using them if you are looking for a service oriented insurance agent.

My husband and I were with another well known insurance company for 9 years. I finally did some research and reached out to Cheryl Hasson who was highly recommended by a friend.  I figured State Farm wouldn't be able to provide my family a better rate especially after being loyal to another company for so long. To my surprise, Cheryl was able to save my family $60 per month for the exact same policy.  On top of that, Cheryl never made me feel like I was just a new policy number. I was a valued customer whose time was respected and my business is appreciated.  I am so thankful I received this referral and I would refer Cheryl Hasson with State Farm to anyone. Thank you, Cheryl.
Excellent facility.  Everything in one stop.  Travel and insurance on first floor.  Drivers Ed on second floor.  Classroom work and driving all starts and stops at the facility. Very convenient.
There's 5 people behind the counter and one station open. And the lady just walked away between customers and said "be right back"
Terrible customer service. I just needed a simple question answered and they tried to transfer me which can take up to 30 minutes longer.
worest branch . People were lazy and not familiar with their own credit card program. Water 1 hour waiting for nothing.

I am about to be a "former" Premier customer with this bank.  I have had two bad experiences with them, the most recent on 11/18/2014.   A merchant made an error and charged my debit card (used as a credit card) for $4123 instead of 123.00.  They voided the sale, however Wells Fargo will not release the money for up to 15 days!  I have the voided slip... still nothing!  If this is how you want to be treated... bank with them.  If not, find somewhere else to go to.  The fact is, they just have people read off of the computer screens and tell you "they are sorry, but they can't help you".
I love Christina's review, but wanted to add that the bank is inside of a grocery store. Wish it would say that on the search.

Having relocated after 25 plus years with Wayne Smith Az Allstate Agency, we were pleased and appreciative to find the same level of service with Mark Taylor Allstate Agency.  We would highly recommend Mark Taylor Allstate Agency, were glad we did w
The Taylor's are always polite, professional, nice, and helpful. Would highly recommend!

I am so glad I found Shayne- she was just awesome. She worked with my schedule when several other CPA's I contacted only made appointments during business hours, so if you are like me and work business hours, it creates a problem! Shayne took her time with me and was very pleasant to work with and helpful. She may be young and cute, but don't let that fool you, she knows her stuff! I went in to her office feeling stressed, nervous, scared, and uncertain.  I left feeling confident, relieved and in good hands. 1 more 5 star review for my new CPA.

I have used Shayne for two years in a row for my tax return. I found her on Yelp last year, when I had a relatively complicated return. 3 W2's, 2 state returns, ISO sales, purchased a house and got married.Shayne did it all with ease, for an incredibly reasonable rate. I used her again this year with the same ease and again for a great rate. 

Highly highly recommend

Shayne is the absolute best CPA.  She's so easy to work with, responsive, fast, and does an incredible job.  She maxed out my return, and was so thorough when looking for additional line items for me to write off.  I highly recommend her to anyone looking for a trustworthy, hard working tax accountant!
I recently moved to AZ and needed my 2013 taxes filed in 2 states. It was fast and painless. Shayne really knows her stuff. I found my new accountant. thanks Yelp!

I'm not going to give them 1 star, but that's because I didn't actually do business with them. I called a few times, no answer. Finally decided to leave a voicemail, asking someone get back to me regarding their services, and I never got a call back. Apparently they don't need new business? I think that even if you don't do business with someone, it's still good etiquette to return multiple missed calls and a voicemail.

UPDATE: I did receive an email... After writing the Yelp review. But by then we had already gone with someone else. Glad she did reach out though. I felt that was courteous and professional.

Shayne is my hero!!! Actually though, I had problems with my taxes for years due to identity theft, re-filling, etc. There were two years where the IRS did not even issue my returns which amounted to about $8,000. I went to Shayne after seeing her great reviews on Yelp and I have yet to be disappointed. Within 6 months she got me the money the IRS had owed me for almost 2 years. Now it's been almost 3 years that I have worked with Shayne and she just helped me set up my llc for my own business, and get my book keeping and payroll in order. She does my parents taxes now as well as my boyfriend and at least 10 of my friends all of whom have nothing but great things to say! She is wonderful!!!
I found Shayne on Yelp. She was friendly, knowledgeable and affordable. My taxes are more than the standard 1040 and everything went very smoothly. I would definitely recommend her.
This was our first experience with her, it was so simple and easy ! I know we will be going back again!!! She was great and so was the office staff!!!!

My husband and I were very impressed with Shayne's services.  She was friendly, efficient, and very knowledgeable.  We've always done our taxes on our own for many years, but from now on we'll plan on working with Shayne.  I highly recommend her to anyone looking for a CPA.

Happy to write a 5 star review for Shayne. She's professional and courteous, and is a joy to work with. She handles our personal and business returns with accuracy and timeliness and never skips a beat when dealing with our messy files! We've had a few different CPA's and we've been most thrilled to work with her. Skip the headaches and call her!

I've had my taxes prepared by Shayne for the last 6+ years, and I would not think to work with anyone else.  In fact, after moving to back to the Washington DC area two years ago, I did, but was very unhappy with the service I received.  I asked Shayne if she could refer me to someone in the area...happily I learned she is able to prepare taxes in other states as well (I initially assumed she could not).
